Blog.post: well well well...wat can i say bout today huh? noting much happen cume nari last day skola *yipee*...woish hari cepat berlalu bsok da selection for airborne course but then my persiapan only 75-85% not 100% fit ah...tpi ill try my best for tomorow selection... kla i haf 2 get enuff rest and ill be posting out my result tomorow so till here den...tata~

hola evribody...hmm wad a beautifool day today...wish i haf a gd life, and be a successful person in my life...k well enuff of da shit selain dari kebahagian ade jugak kesidihan yg terselit di hari ni...story de mcm ni..ade aku apply 4 this sponsorship sampai gi daerah tiong bahru gi interview 4 this thingy ah and nk tungu 4 da result peh lamer..den tdi dpt surat menayatakan bahawase nye ur application is unseccessful...ishk sedih pon ade bab aku mengharap benar itu bende..tpi tkpela da mmg nasib kn...so nvm its okies...so well nant mlm nk trun jap gi study 4 my last paper bsok dgn sab mcm hari tu jugak ah study pai mlm.. *weee* skewl holiday is round da corner..got 2 fill in my schedule dopez..kla till here i gtg..tata`

Morning!!! i wish to have a nice day today hopefully ah and enjoy my day today...yeah nari msok skola kol 1 bole chill jap kt uma can take my own sweet time hehehe...Hey betol ke lau kite teringat kt seseorg tu sampai termimpi2, tandanye kite rindu kt die??? entahla nak no comment lah...

Pheew at last abes gak test..tdi DE ppr punye lar senang...senang nk fail ade lar..haha da la tk blaja tpi nvm its okies can alwaes try harder next time..abes test je tdi trus gi main bola, abes muke aku terbakar..ishk3...ya tk lupe wish kwn aku wawa 17th swit b'dae tpi adek die da pegang hp but i readi remind her 2 wish wani hapi b'dae!!! owitez Dadly's da' name signin off~

haizz wad a boring day...tk tau ape nk write 4 today da lah tdo dari kol 1 tdi skg aru angun must be beri tired..den now eating waffles coklat febret beb...ah' smlm bobal dgn nemo kt fone and she say she's goin back to Aust..wow so fast??? baru je balik..she's goin next week ill pray die slamat pegi dan slamat kembali sudah...gonna miss her!!! Yerpz dats all ah got 2 say. ~Dadly Outz~

ishk strezz siol tadi uat ep test..tpi overall gerekz ah aku dgn member2 kt blkg class copy2/share2 ans..haha bole gitu ehk..hehe..cikgu tgk kn je tpi die tkle uat pape ah de bole senyum je whahaha...arrhh paper da lepas juz wait 4 de result sua..nth special nari mcm biase gak da ole alik siang tpi sab nk umpe ma'am jap de rindu da lame tk jumpe whahaha...den dlm bus 72 kt hogang aku dgn sab tenmpk ma'am dlm bus 72 opp road den tk tau arrh ape sab rase..i cant tell how he feel..haizz sudala tkde idea lagi arrhh..take care Dadly~ bye!!

Assalamualaikum sumer...hmm ape plan nari nk uat eh?? guess ill juz stay home watch movie je gaknye...same ol daily routine.. Arrgghh penat badan.. da lah smlm tdo lmbt den bangon pagi2 lak 2..tpi gerekz seyz angun je check hp tgk nemo msg..heheh so kiutezz...Ishk bsok da start commmon test den 1 bende pon lom blaja ape nk jadi ni??? tkpela it juz cum n go so be it...lgipon common test hahakz...mest kol sab confirm sal bsok lau TDAKKK telajak lah nmpk nye...kla ni utk pagi ni je ..nk enjoy sps arh kkz..ill update moore bout wads happening kkz!!! take care pplez..
wowowow.....wad a 1st timer herez..haha.. hmmph ape huh?? tk tau lar cube2 je nie kkz...

fuyooooo at last im home..hehe..after 1 weeks of expedition cramp was all over my body damm..hmmph so wat 2 write ehk..noting much arh da penat nie btw smlm mlm aru pai uma 1 dalah penat nk type nie pon mls cume nk inform je yg aku da balik..so nant lau senang aku write lagi ah lau ade interesting stories..aku nk blah..slamatz

haiz since a long time aku da tk tulis this thingy..kla lets get tings started...today aku akan pegi mt ophir aduh sedih gitu mcm nk tingal kn s'pore n org yg aku aru2 kenal...hmm ape problem aku nie actually huh?? aku pon confused...adakah aku bertepok 1 hand or other way round? i hope not ah...haizz hidop makain tk tentu arah nmpknye...mcm2 perkara yg terjadi..skejap okay skejap sot..ape nie??? kla 2 be frank im in love gitu...hehe tpi tk pasti org yg aku cinta suke kn aku tk...tkpela shes has tha power to accept or 2 decline..tpi i juz leave it to her 2 tink arhhg..ishk kla basically tats all 4 now ah mungkin i wrote again wen aku da alek..so peeps doakan aku slamat pegi dan slamat kembali insyaalah...Assalamualaikum kawan2...sorry if tis particular post sounds so suckz...but tis is wat i felt..Slamat..

*wee* sori da lame tk update..kinda no mood like dat..tk tau naper..hmm so dat day my selection was so dissapointed..I didnt make it to Hendon Camp(school of commandos) i was so dissapointed with myself..tkpela i can try next time..now its time 4 me 2 train up my stoopid 2.4km..bullshit!!! k ah enuff of da shit there get back 2 todays werk..so tdi gi mt ophir nye training and it was so suck 2 da max..it was not like my batch when we have to carry 6litres of bottles and run wif it around da HQ but tdi juz a stoopid route march...arrgghhh...aiyor tkde pompan ah this batch..so lame..dgr2 this time nye schedule pai resort je ade ropes activites not like my batch tros gi naik base camp..but i tink it will be suck bcauz lepas trun ophir je tros balik no stayin overnite at resort but instead go straight back to S'pore and no shoppin...sucks kan...aduhhhh...okla badan pon da letih nie hope i can write next time..
